theSynthesist:PurityNames.NAME: PurityNames
theSynthesist:PurityNames.DESCRIPTION: used to hold strings for purity since hardcoded strings are bad

theSynthesist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theSynthesist:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theSynthesist:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theSynthesist:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theSynthesist:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSk.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theSynthesist:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theSynthesist:Chug.NAME: Chug
theSynthesist:Chug.DESCRIPTION: Consume your current thesynthesist:mix and start a new thesynthesist:mix. NL Exhaust.
theSynthesist:Chug.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Consume your current thesynthesist:mix and start a new thesynthesist:mix.
